text: Ovis is a genus of the subfamily Caprinae, of the family Bovidae. The wild sheep and domestic sheep and other animals like it belong to this genus. There are 5 or more animals in this genus. == Taxonomy == * Genus Ovis ** Ovis orientalis group *** Ovis orientalis **** Mouflon (Ovis orientalis orientalis group) ***** Domestic sheep (Ovis aries or Ovis orientalis aries) **** Urial (Ovis orientalis vignei group) *** Argali or mountain sheep (Ovis ammon) ** Ovis canadensis group *** Snow sheep (Ovis nivicola) *** Thinhorn sheep (Ovis dalli) ****Dall sheep (Ovis dalli dalli) ****Stone sheep (Ovis dalli stonei) *** Bighorn sheep (Ovis canadensis) These are the main species of ovis. Ovis ammon Argali Ovis orientalis ariesICZN (International Commission on Zoological Nomenclature) opinion 2027 Domestic sheep Orientalis orientalis orientalis group Mouflon Ovis orientalis vignei group Urial Ovis canadensis Bighorn sheep Ovis dalli Thinhorn sheep Ovis nivicola Snow sheep == References == == Other websites == Category:Caprids
title: Ovis
